channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Guns N’ Roses Address Axl Rose’s Onstage Outburst in Buenos Aires
item.description: Rock on! Guns N' Roses open up about Axl Rose's fiery performance moment in Buenos Aires 🔥🎸 #GNR #MusicNews

item.title: Jon Bon Jovi Talks Collaborating With Bruce Springsteen and Jelly Roll
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends unite! Jon Bon Jovi spills the beans on working with The Boss and Jelly Roll! 🤘 #MusicCollab #RockLegends

item.title: Alexisonfire talk ‘Crisis’ 20 year plans & new music: “there’s elements of ‘Watch Out'”
item.description: 🔥 Alexisonfire dropping hints about future plans and new music! Are you ready to dive into 'Watch Out' vibes? 🎶 #Alexisonfire #NewMusicTease

item.title: Florence + the Machine Announce 2026 ‘Everybody Scream’ North American Tour
item.description: 🎉 Pump up the volume and get ready to dance with Florence + the Machine on their 'Everybody Scream' tour hitting North America in 2026! 🎶💃 #FlorenceAndTheMachine #EverybodyScreamTour

item.title: Fred again.. Shares New Tracks With Caribou & MC Teteu, Floating Points
item.description: 🚀 Dive into the cosmic soundscape with Fred again.., Caribou, MC Teteu, and Floating Points! 🎶✨ #MusicCollab #NewTracks
